channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unroadworthy vehicle parked in spot for two months, 15th June
item.description:
This van has been parked outside our house for about two months now and has not moved at all during that time. There are large cracks in the windscreen and the tyres are starting to deflate - so the van appears to be unroadworthy. There is a vast amount of kitchen equipment in the front passenger seat so it appears that whoever owns the van is using it for storage and taking advantage of the free parking on the street rather than seeking an appropriate site to store the items. This is not fair to residents and other users of the street who wish to park close to their house and is also not the point of on street parking - itâ€™s not a storage facility. Would like something to be done about this.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gulley grating blocked near lamp column FP3, 15th June
item.description:
Gulley grating blocked near lamp column FP3. This is the second blocked gulley grating on this footpath, the other is near lamp column FP6..Neither of these gullies are shown on the council's gully map .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berger Close, Poverest, London

item.title: Incorrect Electric Vehicle bay, 15th June
item.description:
